zipkin.cassandra

Class CassandraSpanStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.collect.ForwardingObject
      • zipkin.spanstore.guava.GuavaToAsyncSpanStoreAdapter
        • zipkin.cassandra.CassandraSpanStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, AsyncSpanConsumer, AsyncSpanStore, GuavaAsyncSpanConsumer, GuavaSpanStore

    public final class CassandraSpanStore
extends GuavaToAsyncSpanStoreAdapter
implements GuavaSpanStore, AutoCloseable
    CQL3 implementation of a span store.

    This uses zipkin-cassandra-core which packages "/cassandra-schema-cql3.txt"
